message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I think it would be a great deal for you!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $87.50. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here.  $88 is my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $85?
